message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $95. I hope this works for you.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $95 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell the product to you for $105.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $100 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $105 for the product. I hope this aligns with your needs.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit short on the price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $109.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $107 for the product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to accepting, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I can sell the product to you for $110.
Thank you for considering my offers, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $108 for the product. I hope this final offer meets your needs.
